participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, she enjoys expressing herself through art and music.
participant_1.background: My commute is the best part of my day, as I get to listen to my favorite music and think about my robotics projects. I'm healthy because I'm responsible with my diet and I get enough sleep. I've always loved to paint, but I don't think I could do it if I were blind. I don't have a car, but I often bike to the basketball court. I like fantasizing.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Dedicated and ambitious, he balances his creative pursuits with his responsibilities.
participant_2.background: I wake up early in the morning, work on my book until noon, and then study for the police academy. I need to balance my work and family life. I once got a chocolate bar that my dog didn't like, so I got to eat it all! I can't wait to wear my new sweater when I go horseback riding. I dress for my audience.

content.text: What are your favorite things to do?
I like to read and go for walks.
I love to paint and write.
That's awesome! What kind of things do you paint?
That's so cool! I wish I could paint.
You can always learn! I took classes in high school and college.
I may look into that. I like to draw too.
That's a great start! I used to draw a lot when I was younger.
I'm not very good at it, but I have fun.
That's all that matters! I'm sure you're better than you think.
Thanks! I'm going to try to practice more.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a pro in no time.
I hope so! I'm excited to try.
